TopicTitle: Sector 7 Space Laboratories Crew Transporter SSCT-12

Articles.Content:
This craft had me stuck what to name it, a Shuttle Craft or a Transporter, it still needs some work because it has no landing gear or parachutes and one Kerbal that is stuck like Chuck the fuel tank has obstructed the exit. It's purpose is only to transport from Station to Station. It carries three pilots and nine passengers with each their own compartment for personal privacy during space travel. (Correction was made on this post, the Craft name and description was changed because of the Cockpit Capacity)

Crew Transporter SSCT-12

The underside
